doc.previous: The four gradient of a scalar field transforms covariantly rather than contravariantly  The transformation rules for three dimensional velocities and accelerations are very awkward even above in standard configuration the velocity equations are quite complicated owing to their non linearity On the other hand the transformation of four velocity and four acceleration are simpler by means of the Lorentz transformation matrix
